content.title: Generalized Lymphatic Anomaly
content.description: Rare disorder with diffuse lymphatic malformations affecting multiple organs including bone, soft tissue, and viscera.

clinical_features.bone_involvement: Lytic bone lesions (unlike Gorham - no progressive destruction)

content.clinical_pearl: Unlike Gorham-Stout, bone lesions are stable; sirolimus increasingly used as systemic therapy
